text:
aur bhai Ankan...... sab badhiyan
apni jaan pehchan shuru hui thi kyonki tu ek bande se pareshan hokar mere room aa jaya karta tha first year mein (yaad to hoga hiğŸ˜‚)
khair lagbhag 4 saal nikal gaye uske baad
bakchodiyan to bohot hui hain....... aur tere itna chill banda shayad hi kahi dekhunga (par kabhi kabhi jyada hi chill ho jata hai tu)
khair movies suggest karte rahiyo mast mast.
ek dream to adhura reh gya (short film).......... khuda ne chaha to wo khwab jeevan mein kabhi pura ho jaegağŸ˜‚
aakhiri dino ki bakchodi me you were missed...... Lekin zindagi bahut lambi hai dost......... aage kisi aur andaz me bakchodiyan karenge....... tab tak ke liye namaskarğŸ˜‚
author: Ankur  Vatsa

text:
aur anukant.... kya haal hai
samay ka to kaam hi hai nikalna..... aur samay se karmath to koi hai hi nhi
dekhte dekhte 4 saal nikal hi gya (nikalna hi tha)
kaafi badhiyan raha yaar ye time
saala ye likh rahe hain aur bagal wale ghar se tera alarm (besharmi ki height) baj raha haiğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ (divine intervention)
jyada to kya hi likhenge...... milte hain jaldi..... karte hain party
author: Ankur  Vatsa

text:
Hey man........ 
Our interactions after the first year was very limited but the memories of our initial interactions are still sound in my mind. Most of our interactions were limited to discussions about good moviesğŸ˜„........... and thanks to that my interest in watching quality movies persisted.
Our common path in this part of the journey was short, but I hope that in this grand journey that is life we will meet again and cherish new memories.
Good luck.
author: Ankur  Vatsa

text:
pehli baar to Kota me hi mile the.... (lekin bas mile hi the.... None of us knew that the journey was not over, that we would meet again and under pawry circumstances).
50 days of quarantine par ek kitaab likhi ja sakti hai....... aur Lala Halwai ke bina wo kitaab na to shuru ho payegi aur na khatam.
4 saal to khatam ho gye..... lekin apni journey abhi shuru hui hai....50 days of quarantine was a start and it will not end until there is an endless streak of pawwriessss. (We fight till the end).
Do baatein humesha yaad rakhna aur jeevan sukhi rahega
Valar Morghulis
Valar Dohaeris
author: Ankur  Vatsa

text:
Aur chitranshi..... kya haal chal
Yaar hum log humesha bas short times ke liye hi mile......... iska thoda dukh hai
Tere sath achi memories rahi humesha......... although hum log bohot alag the...... jaha mera excitement level khatam hota hai kisi chiz ka waha tera shayad shuru bhi nhi hota ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
chappal tootne se lekar college chootne ka safar khatam ho gya...... aur jholi me kuch achi yaadein aur ek achi dost shamil ho gyi...
milte hain kabhi........ jald hi.........
author: Ankur  Vatsa

text:
Bhai.... tere se pehli baar HSS ke kisi event related hi mile the shayad...... aur uske baad poore 4 saal kahi na kahi milte hi rahe (ENG wali group to yaad rahegi bhaiğŸ˜„)
Tu bohot hardworking banda hai yaar..... Bahut jyada interaction to nahi hua apna par ye chiz shuru se hi dikhi tujhme...
Aise hi chaapte rahiyo bhai....
Milte hain kabhi phir jeevan me
author: Ankur  Vatsa

text:
Roller bhaiya ko pranam.....
First year me sath baith ke psychological thrillers par dimag kharab karna shuru kiye the hum log........ mereko The Sixth Sense ka climax scene abhi bhi yaad hai.... Hum dono bas dekhte reh gaye the ki Wtf just happened.
Second year end me tune hi debut karaya........ Third year me debutants pro ban gye.......... aur final year me MHCD.
2 hi logon ke rolling perfection ka fan hun main.... unme se ek tu hai 
Khair sath to lamba rahega apna
Milte hain jald..... naye andaz aur purane jazbaat mein
author: Ankur  Vatsa

text:
Hey Kiran........ kaisi hai
The department of economics brought us together, but our meet was ephemeral (aaj subah ephemeral word kahi dikha tha isliye use karne ka man kar gya basğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„)
Mostly assignments aur jugaad mein hi sath rahe hum log...... parties me bhi ho sakte the lekin last ke lockdown ne saare plans pure nahi hone diye..... Khair.... Rather that repenting on memories not created, it's always better to thank the memories lived.
Memories short rahi apni...... lekin achi aur sweet rahi..... iske liye dhanyawad.
Hoping to add more coaches in our train of memories.
Goodbye and goodluck.
author: Ankur  Vatsa

author: Ankur  Vatsa

text:
Aur Rajni bhai........
Ncc ke time se hi backup alarm clock tu rehta thağŸ˜‚
kaafi samay nikal gya uske baad (bc pure 4 saal hi nikal gye) lekin yaadein ban gyi.
5th year me jyada parties to nhi ho payengi shayad.
waise mereko bohot khushi hai ki jate jate tere sath bhi party ho gyi.....
Chalte hain kabhi sath mein LAUNCH karne phir ek baarğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
author: Ankur  Vatsa

text:
aur sanket kaisa hai bhai....              
4 saal sath hi rahe hum log.... to ekdum family type wala bonding ho hi gya tha
meko yaad aa rha hai abhi ki kaise tum humesha naye ideas ke sath excitement me aata tha..... aur mera reaction rehta tha 'dekhte hain yaar'ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…
Khair saare ideas to implement nhi hue..... par party wale to lagbhag sare ho hi gye.
Ek naya universal khana choose kar liyo ab kyonki Japan me maggi aur bhel to milega nhiğŸ˜…
Baaki to milte hain...... karte hain party
author: Ankur  Vatsa

text:
Aur bhai jugaadu pro max..... kaisa hai bhai....
kaafi jugaad karaya hai bhai tune (jugaad na bhi ho to koshish to puri ki tuneğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚)
khair jugaad to bas ek aspect raha hai..... baki choti si wing apni bakchod rahi yaar first year se hi aur repi to bakchod launda tha hi (jo kahi bhi maar karne ko humesha taiyar rehta thağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚)
khushi hai iss baat ki ki kaanch tehas nahas ho gya..... gham hai ki anukant ka guitar nahi tod payeğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
aakhri pachas din to bakchod rahe bhai (Wing photoshoot aur wing party to humesha yaad rahegi)... matlab maza hi aa gya
milte hain jald hi sab phir.........
author: Ankur  Vatsa
